1: <mistake>@//ba'i</mistake> don de <mistake>'jig</mistake> pa <mistake>med//rnam</mistake> rig sna tshogs rang bzhin <mistake>don//sems</mistake> dang rnam shes <mistake>rgyud</mistake> dang <mistake>ldan//dngos</mistake> po <mistake>m</mistake> lus don <mistake>dag z'a</mistake> <mistake>ba//stong</mistake> pa <mistake>nyid</mistake> <mistake>dag'</mistake> 'dod chags <mistake>blo //srid</mistake> pa'i
2: 'dod chags la sogs <mistake>'das// srid</mistake> pa gsum po dga' <mistake>ba che//dag</mistake> pa <mistake>sdin</mistake> dkar bzhin du <mistake>dkar//'d</mistake> <mistake>bsang</mistake> ston ka'i zla <mistake>ba'i</mistake> <mistake>'d//nyi</mistake> ma <mistake>'tshar</mistake> ka'i dkyil <mistake>'khor</mistake> <mistake>mdzes//'dod</mistake> chags chen po
3: sen <mistake>mo'i</mistake> <mistake>'od//zur</mistake> phud bzang po mthon ka'i <mistake>mchog / sga</mistake> mchog mthon ka <mistake>chan</mistake> po <mistake>'chang//nor</mistake> bu chen po 'od chags <mistake>dpal//sangs</mistake> rgyas <mistake>spul</mistake> <mistake>pa'i</mistake> rgyan dang ldan // 'jig rten khams brgya kun
4: bskyod <mistake>pa//rdzu</mistake> 'phrul rkang pa <mistake>stobs</mistake> chen <mistake>ldan//de</mistake> <mistake>nyid</mistake> dran pa chen po <mistake>chang//dran</mistake> pa <mistake>bzi</mistake> <mistake>bo</mistake> ding 'dzin <mistake>rgyal// byang</mistake> chub yan lag me tog <mistake>dga'//de</mistake> bzhin gshegs pa yon tan <mistake>mtsho//lam</mistake> gyi
5: yan lag brgyad tshul <mistake>rig /yang</mistake> dag <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas lam rig <mistake>pa//semas</mistake> <mistake>ca</mistake> <mistake>rkun</mistake> la shas <mistake>chor</mistake> <mistake>chags//nam</mistake> mkha' lta bur chags pa <mistake>med//sems</mistake> can kun gyi yid las <mistake>skyes//sems</mistake> can
6: kun gyi yid ltar <mistake>mgyogs//sems</mistake> can kun gyi <mistake>dbang</mistake> don <mistake>shes//sems</mistake> can kun gyi <mistake>mid</mistake> 'phrog <mistake>pa//phung</mistake> po lnga don de nyid <mistake>shes// rnam</mistake> dag phung po lnga 'chang <mistake>pa//thams</mistake> cad <mistake>dges</mistake> 'byung mtha'
7: la <mistake>gnas//thams</mistake> cad nges par 'byung ba <mistake>mkhas//thams</mistake> cad nges 'byung lam la <mistake>gnas// thams</mistake> cad nges 'byung ston pa <mistake>po//yan</mistake> <mistake>lag</mistake> bcu gnyis srid rtsa <mistake>bton//dag</mistake> pa rnam pa bcu
8: gnyis <mistake>'chang//bden</mistake> <mistake>bzhi'i</mistake> tshul gyi rnam pa <mistake>can//shes</mistake> pa brgyad po rtogs pa <mistake>'chang//bde</mistake> don rnam pa <mistake>bcu</mistake> <mistake>gnyis</mistake> <mistake>ldan// de</mistake> nyid <mistake>rnampa</mistake> <mistake>btu</mistake> drug <mistake>ig/rnam</mistake> <mistake>bpa</mistake> nyi <mistake>sus</mistake> <mistake>byaing</mistake> chub <mistake>pa /rnam</mistake>
